parameters.name: Configs
parameters.description: A list of configurations for each rule, specifying detailed configurations for each rule.

parameters.name: Phase
parameters.description:
WAF rule type, with values:

- **http_anti_scan**: Scan protection.
- **http_bot**: Bots.

parameters.name: Shared
parameters.description: Shared configuration for multiple rules, specifying common attributes of multiple rules.

parameters.name: SiteId
parameters.description: Site ID, which can be obtained by calling the [ListSites](~~2850189~~) interface.
